questions.question: What is the primary textual content displayed prominently on the label?
What specific dietary information is categorized and detailed in the central section?
Considering the nutritional values, what is the indicated serving size in tablespoons?
Based on the serving size, approximately how many servings are present in the entire container?
In terms of caloric content, what is the total number of calories per serving?
What specific type of fat has the highest percentage value listed in the nutritional information?
Concerning cholesterol, what is the amount present in milligrams per serving?
How much sodium, in milligrams, is present in a single serving of the product?
What is the percentage of the daily value for Vitamin A per serving?
Based on the nutritional facts, what is the percentage of the daily value for Vitamin C per serving?
What is the percentage of the daily value for Calcium per serving, as indicated on the label?
What is the percentage of the daily value for Iron per serving, as stated in the nutritional information?
What is the total amount of protein in grams per serving, according to the label?
What is the total amount of sugars in grams per serving, as specified in the nutritional data?
What is the primary color used for the text on the nutritional facts label?
